          <title>
            <string language="en">Discharging objects by earthing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entladung der Nachrichten durch Erdung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décharge des objets par l'earthing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Descarregando objetos pelo earthing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scaricando gli oggetti dal earthing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απαλλαγή των αντικειμένων με την επιχωμάτωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Descargar objetos por el earthing</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how negatively and positively charged objects are discharged by connecting it to the earth with a metal conductor.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">discharging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earthing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie negativ und positiv 
belastete Nachrichten durch das Anschließen es an die Masse mit einem
Metallleiter entladen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment des objets 
négativement et franchement chargés sont déchargés en le reliant 
à la terre à un conducteur en métal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como os objetos negativamente
e positivamente carregados são descarregados conectando o à terra 
com um condutor do metal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra quanto gli oggetti 
negativamente e positivamente caricati sono scaricati collegandolo 
alla terra con un conduttore del metallo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πόσο τα αρνητικά και 
θετικά χρεωμένα αντικείμενα απαλλάσσονται με τη σύνδεση του με τη
γη με έναν αγωγό μετάλλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo los objetos 
negativamente y positivamente cargados son descargados conectándolo 
con la tierra con un conductor del metal.</string>
          </description>
